response.overview: Solaria has been undercover posing as the girlfriend of the agency's number one most wanted crime boss. She has been dark for months with the only communication handled through her partner, another agent tasked with keeping Solaria safe and the agency up to date. Solaria's deep cover has forced her into a sexual relationship with the crime boss, and as a side effect to the deep cover, Solaria has developed a drug habit. Her ego won't allow her to seek help and her judgement is potentially compromised. Maybe that's why she doesn't realize her partner is about to double cross her.  She has no choice. Not knowing who's behind the blackmail and not wanting to blow months of deep cover, she fights. Always a little too cocky, she figures she can handle the strong man. What she doesn't realize is the person who is blackmailing her knows her strengths and weaknesses better than she knows them herself. She has no idea what she's in for...
response.title: Facade
